events.name: New DNA Evidence Suggests First Australians May Have Arrived Later Than Previously Thought
events.description: New study uses DNA evidence to challenge claims that humans arrived in Sahul 65,000 years ago, pointing to a later migration instead.

generated_content.title: Historical Mysteries in Tool, Henderson County - Tours & Services
generated_content.description: Explore the mysterious history of Tool, Henderson County, where new DNA evidence suggests that the first Australians may have arrived later than previously thought. Discover the region's rich cultural heritage and uncover the secrets of its fascinating past.
